title: MSI introduces CreatorPro series with professional NVIDIA RTX GPUs
content:
MSI has announced the CreatorPro series of laptops, unsurprisingly aimed at creative professionals. The new lineup includes five laptops, all featuring the new professional NVIDIA RTX GPUs, which were announced earlier today at NVIDIA’s GTC keynote. MSI CreatorPro Z17 and Z16P First, there’s the CreatorPro Z17 and Z16P, which are top-tier professional laptops powered by

The post MSI introduces CreatorPro series with professional NVIDIA RTX GPUs appeared first on xda-developers.
description: MSI has annoucned the new CreatorPro family of laptops geared towards creative professionals and featuring up to an NVIDIA RTX A5500 GPU.
